actions.name: Regurgitation
actions.description:
Effect: Connection - Gulp Missile. The user makes a @Affliction[grapple] Maneuver against a creature at least one size smaller than the user, with +10 per CatMod difference. On success, the user Engulfs the target, equipping the creature as a [Stash] item.The user can only have one creature @Affliction[engulfed] at a time. An @Affliction[engulfed] creature cannot act or be affected by actions or effects in any way, except to free itself with a -20 @Affliction[grapple] check.

When the user hits a target with an attack while it has an @Affliction[engulfed] creature, it deals a Tick of HP damage to the target. This damage possesses the Type(s) of the @Affliction[engulfed] creature.

If the user gains @Affliction[fainted], the @Affliction[engulfed] creature may freely escape if it chooses, appearing in a space adjacent to the user.
